textBox.richText: I Am Cell, We Are Zeitgeist: 9/19/08

Sorry for the late post... I guess it's not that late new show link: http://www.kdvs.org/shows/view/show_id/527/date/2008-09-12/ I'm gunna start posting the stream links as well, so people can access them more than a week later... I might go back and change all my old shows, or just make some season one pages: http://www.kdvs.org/listen/m3u/show_id/527/date/2008-09-19 Best of Show! FUCKIN LISTEN TO IT! HELLZA GOODS.  New adds: Los Campesinos! - Sticking Fingers Into Sockets Immortal Technique - Revolutionary Vol. 2 Sigur Ros - Agaetis Byrjun The Octopus Project - One Ten Hundred Thousand Million Hanne Hukkelberg - Rykestrasse 68 Junior Senior - Hey Hey My My Yo Yo Boards of Canada - Music Has the Right to Children Godspeed, You Black Emperor! - Yanqui U.X.O Dan Deacon - Spiderman of the Rings MGMT - Oracular Spectacular So... I don't really want to, but I guess I'm gunna do my interim slot this week, we'll see if I make it to my discussions on friday.  NEW TIME SLOT NEXT WEEK: Mondays 9:30-12 (in the am)   Now reasonable people can listen!... but it's not safe harbor so I'll have to screen my show, oh well, it's all goods.  I'm guessing that's not really going to help my hip-hop cause. Happy Listening
